name: Hovermania
description:
Test the limits of your intellect, dexterity, and mental fortitude in a challenging 3D puzzle platformer game, except your character is a car. Drive around and collect every crystal in the level without running out of battery to complete it. Don't get distracted by it's relaxing music (courtesy of Ludwig and Schlatt's Music Emporium), this game is not for the faint of heart.

Compete against an in-game global leaderboard and find where you stand in each of the 12 levels, with each level being progressively more challenging to complete. Can you find the fastest lines to complete each level and snag the top spot?
